text: They basically re-invented the {Entity,Attribute,Value}/{Subject,Predicate,Object} style one sees in datalog/semantic web databases, but calling the Entity/Subject a "thing". Hopefully they kept improving it after 2010 until they realized they actually want triplicate indexing to allow good performance with complete query flexibility.
